title: Burning Castle
description:
Don’t look back. Don’t look back. Don’t look back.
 But she did.And he’s watching her.Alice Flores Alice sees danger faster than the click of her shutter. Claudia attracts bad news like flies to honey. With the death of their parents, Alice is the only thing standing between Claudia and disaster. Except this time, she doesn't save Claudia, and this time, danger is coming for Alice.Castle Moretti No weakness. No attachments. No future. He lives his life knowing his grave was dug the night he watched his family die. Life is Never What You Plan He has a chance to gain back everything that he's lost, he just needs to keep the castle from burning down to have it all. Contains strong language, violence, and sexual content. Reader’s discretion is advised.
author: Sophia Peony
